acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle Singletons with parameters in the static method
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleSingletonsWithParametersInPublicStaticMethod

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.SingletonWithParametersInStaticFactoryPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the String field XSurlGV3wx cannot be null or empty

Then the List<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 113 byteObjectField = 32 shortField = 33 shortObjectField = 49 charField = x charObjectField = 4 intField = 855145007 intObjectField = -1940969429 longField = 664611045288438 longObjectField = 664611045088849 floatField = 0.9391485 floatObjectField = 0.8667957 doubleField = 0.11055624528982522 doubleObjectField = 0.7192210092292961 stringField = BNLAjbeMdK objectField = java.lang.Object@5ea7ad41 calendarField = Wed Jul 08 23:32:16 BST 2015 dateField = Wed Jul 08 23:32:16 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@3dc70c5a intArray = [I@48d46169 booleanArray = [Z@62f90937 bigDecimalField = 472565755937 ) should not be null and contain at least one non-empty element

Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{QDL1iuUfp9=OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 59 byteObjectField = 41 shortField = 86 shortObjectField = 94 charField = D charObjectField = 3 intField = 663467919 intObjectField = -795757300 longField = 664611071307680 longObjectField = 664611071079203 floatField = 0.22366887 floatObjectField = 0.48357624 doubleField = 0.10217349462276593 doubleObjectField = 0.9409114524880863 stringField = 8BIjE8t3vr objectField = java.lang.Object@5ea7ad41 calendarField = Wed Jul 08 23:32:16 BST 2015 dateField = Wed Jul 08 23:32:16 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@69dc041a intArray = [I@6328eb18 booleanArray = [Z@d552cbf bigDecimalField = 472565755937 ) should contain at least one non empty element
